header.title: ssl_crl_cache

description.p: Implements an internal CRL (Certificate Revocation List) cache. In addition to implementing the ssl_crl_cache_api behaviour the following functions are available.

func.name: delete(Entries) -> ok | {error, Reason}
func.fsummary: Delete CRLs from the ssl applications local cache.

desc.p: Delete CRLs from the ssl applications local cache.

func.fsummary: Insert CRLs into the ssl applications local cache.

desc.p: Insert CRLs into the ssl applications local cache, with or without a distribution point reference URI
